fields.Title: WHIRLING / KIM INTRO
fields.Description: Downstairs ltn Kim Kitsuragi - precinct 57th's finest - is waiting to solve THE HANGED MAN with you as an inter-district co-op. It would appear Precinct 41 sent you to investigate the lynching of a "Whitewater mercenary" in "Martinaise". And that you are indeed a police officer. Kim briefs you on the case and your relationship begins - likely on the wrong foot, but not necessarily.

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""It wasn't on me when I woke up.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It wasn't on me when I woke up."

fields.Title: You: "Invent a name for yourself."
fields.Dialogue Text: Invent a name for yourself.

Horrific Necktie: "Even classier. You should take this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even classier. You should take this opportunity to start your life anew as a *classier* person -- as Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau.
fields.Alternate1: More classy. Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau is one classy name -- and you're one classy cop.

fields.Title: You: ""Look man, you know, yeah.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look man, you know, yeah."

fields.Title: You: ""Completely.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Completely."

fields.Title: Logic: "And then, soon after, dead bodies w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And then, soon after, dead bodies would be dangling from all the trees.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose you could be impersonati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suppose you could be impersonating him. You could have gotten the insignia from the black market or forged it. But for now I am going to set those possibilities aside. I'm not from the Inspectorate General."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need for derogatory terms. They..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need for derogatory terms. They are only doing their job."

fields.Title: You: ""Uh... Inspectorate General?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh... Inspectorate General?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was to meet a detective from Pre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was to meet a detective from Precinct 41 at the Whirling-in-Rags who arrived here three days ago. I am told that that is how long you have been here. Besides, you match his description." He looks you over.

fields.Title: You: ""You mean internal affairs?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean internal affairs?"

fields.Title: You: "It's very cool, but won't I come of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's very cool, but won't I come off like a douche if I call myself that?

fields.Alternate1: No, you won't. Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau is one classy name and you're one classy cop. Say it!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Regardless, I would also suggest t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Regardless, I would also suggest that you locate your blazer with your official insignia." He points to the white rectangle on his sleeve.

Kim Kitsuragi: ""...where it has been hanging for s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...where it has been hanging for seven days straight. We should go there as soon as we're done talking to the owner."

fields.Title: Kim case intro HUB
You: ""You said insignia. These white rec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said insignia. These white rectangles, you mean?" (Point to your sleeve.)

fields.Title: You: ""Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh..." There's a moment's pause, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh..." There's a moment's pause, then he continues, carefully: "If you didn't have your badge then that would be very *bad*. You would need to report it on my shortwave. But since you *do* have it, we can go straight to the task at hand."
fields.Alternate1: "Oh..." There's a moment's pause. It lasts longer than it may ordinarily, given the circumstances. "If you didn't have your badge then that would be very *bad*. You would need to report it on my shortwave. But since you *do* have it, we can go straight to the task at hand."

fields.Title: You: ""Dead body?""

You: ""That's right! I'm a man for all se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right! I'm a man for all seasons, baby!"

fields.Title: You: ""What if I have an uncanny doppelgä..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What if I have an uncanny doppelgänger?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You may have murdered the man I wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You may have murdered the man I was supposed to meet and are now impersonating him. You may be his twin, stepping in for his even more incapacitated brother out of loyalty and love."

fields.Title: Drama: "Not for a moment does he believe th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not for a moment does he believe that's your real name. He casts it aside as an intradepartmental joke or a peculiarity he doesn't understand.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I don't think so." He studies..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I don't think so." He studies you briefly. "We should ask him for a run-down of the area now that I'm here as well. I understand the scene is out back, right?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It also wouldn't hurt to assure hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It also wouldn't hurt to assure him the police are finally here. In full force, I mean. Have you mapped out the initial interviews?"

fields.Title: You: ""I haven't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I haven't."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see you drank last night, an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can see you drank last night, and the night before," he says after a moment of silence. "And that you are still drunk now. But I have seen officers go through worse. Much worse."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure. But did you take it down fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure. But did you take it down from the tree?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [tre]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""They're not *just* white rectangle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're not *just* white rectangles. They bear a halogen watermark with the letters RCM and a pattern resembling the street grid of Revachol West. I could step into the headlights of my Kineema and show you, but right now I just need you to do your job."

fields.Alternate1: No, it's not! Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau is one classy name for one classy cop. Say it!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You seem a little unsure, officer...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seem a little unsure, officer. Have you spent too much time undercover lately?" He cracks an uneasy smile to let you know it's a joke.

A bespectacled man in an orange bomber jacket is tapping his foot on the floor. Looks like he's waiting for someone -- you.
fields.Alternate1: A bespectacled man in a black bomber jacket is tapping his foot on the floor. Looks like he's waiting for someone -- you.

fields.Title: You: ""Just call me *Officer*"."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just call me *Officer*".

fields.Title: You: "It's very, very cool. But maybe jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's very, very cool. But maybe just a bit too... ostentatious?

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "You instinctively run your hand ove..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You instinctively run your hand over the multi-patterned silk of your tie. Its slickness gives you comfort and reassurance.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, then." He processes the info..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, then." He processes the information, then disregards it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was sent here to meet a detectiv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was sent here to meet a detective from Precinct 41. You have the insignia of the Citizens Militia on your sleeve and on your back." He points to your jacket.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "A bespectacled man in an orange bom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A bespectacled man in an orange bomber jacket has folded up his newspaper and is now tapping his foot on the floor. Looks like he's been waiting for quite some time.

fields.Title: You: ""Uh... Inspectorate General?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh... Inspectorate General?"

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, shouldn't I have a badge or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, shouldn't I have a badge or something?" (Check your pockets.)
fields.Alternate1: "Wait, shouldn't I have a badge or something?" (Check your undies.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""My name is Raphaël Ambrosius Coste..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very well. Officer..." He's slight..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very well. Officer..." He's slightly confused.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You realize he is waiting for your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You realize he is waiting for your name.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It looks like we had a little sche..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It looks like we had a little scheduling error on Sunday. Saturday too, actually... Have you had time to talk to the manager here?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. But even if you haven't, we'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. But even if you haven't, we'll have time for that after we take a look at the coroner's case."

fields.Title: You: ""But shouldn't I have a badge or so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But shouldn't I have a badge or something?" (Check your pockets.)
fields.Alternate1: "But shouldn't I have a badge or something?" (Check your undies.)

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Inspectorate General means internal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspectorate General means internal affairs. What he's saying is he's not from the *rat squad* and isn't supposed to suspect such things.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need for derogatory terms. They..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need for derogatory terms. They are only doing their job."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't really know my name.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't really know my name."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "As you approach, he narrows his eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you approach, he narrows his eyes and extends his hand in greeting.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""It looks like we had a little sche..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then we should ask him for a run-d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then we should ask him for a run-down of the area, get me up to speed. I understand the scene is out back, right?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, of course.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, of course."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean you don't have a badge?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean you don't have a badge?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim case intro HUB]
Jump to: [Kim case intro HUB]
You: "(Pretend you found it.) "I have my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Pretend you found it.) "I have my badge. I'm a police man and I have my badge."

fields.Title: You: ""What description?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What description?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Internal affairs. And I'm not them..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Internal affairs. And I'm not them. I'm from Criminal Investigation."
A bespectacled man in an orange bomber jacket has folded up his newspaper and is now tapping his foot on the floor. Looks like he's been waiting for quite some time.
fields.Alternate1: A bespectacled man in a black bomber jacket has folded up his newspaper and is now tapping his foot on the floor. Looks like he's been waiting for quite some time.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "The best cure for a headache is, of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The best cure for a headache is, of course, morphine. They won't have that, so cigarettes will have to do.

fields.Title: You: "Hold on, who is he to me?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold on, who is he to me?

fields.Title: You: ""What interviews?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What interviews?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At the 57th, we like to prepare an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At the 57th, we like to prepare an initial list of persons of interest and then just... skim the surface." He gestures with his fingers. "Prepare the field, get to know the players. You don't do that? Maybe it's not an inter-district practice..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you need something for your hea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you need something for your headache, there is a general store nearby. But, as I said, the dead body should be our number one concern."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They're not *just* white rectangle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're not *just* white rectangles. They bear a halogen watermark with the letters RCM and a pattern resembling the street grid of Revachol West."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""After you, officer.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "After you, officer."

fields.Title: You: ""You think I'm a cop? I can't be a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think I'm a cop? I can't be a police officer! Look at me!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "After catching your attention, he n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: After catching your attention, he narrows his eyes and extends his hand in greeting.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "If an assault were launched on this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If an assault were launched on this building right now -- if the windows came crashing down and the whole world descended upon you -- this man would hurl himself in death's way to save you. You are sure of this -- but why?

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Concentration makes you squint your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Concentration makes you squint your eyes. Your name should be deep gold and orange, like a forest fire looming on the horizon, but mixed with the stench of liquor rising from your breath. You're two steps closer to it, but there are still many to go...

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Yes, it is. Raphaël Ambrosius Coste..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, it is. Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau sounds solemn and historical. This is an opportunity to start your life anew as a *classier* person.
fields.Alternate1: Yes it is. Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau is one classy name for one classy cop. Say it!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hello, I'm Kim Kitsuragi." He look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello, I'm Kim Kitsuragi." He looks unfazed. "Lieutenant, Precinct 57. You must be from the 41st..."

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.garte_altgreeting_done"]
Variable["whirling.garte_altgreeting_done"]
!(Variable["whirling.garte_altgreeting_done"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right, and the interviews?" He tap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right, and the interviews?" He taps his foot -- more out of habit than impatience.

fields.Title: You: ""But they're just white rectangles.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But they're just white rectangles."

fields.Title: Empathy: "It's barely noticeable, but he migh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's barely noticeable, but he might be *a bit* annoyed at your rudeness. Then he lets it go -- more important matters need tending to.

fields.Title: cleanerhub
You: ""But they're just white rectangles.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But they're just white rectangles."

fields.Title: You: ""Uh, I'm... maybe I'm Harry?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh, I'm... maybe I'm Harry?"

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi is now in your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lieutenant Kitsuragi is now in your party. You can talk to him whenever, by interacting with him.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "What a shame. Get to it now. *Rip*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What a shame. Get to it now. *Rip* that body down from the tree.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "You instinctively run your hand ove..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You instinctively run your hand over your multi-patterned orange tie. The sensation of wrinkled silk somehow makes the name sound even cooler.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Don't worry. Raphaël Ambrosius Cost..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't worry. Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau sounds solemn and historical. Take this opportunity to start your life anew as a *classier* person.
fields.Alternate1: Don't worry. Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau is one classy name -- for one classy cop.

fields.Title: You: ""Who? You? You're with the police?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who? You? You're with the police?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Does that mean the body is no long..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Does that mean the body is no longer in the tree?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "This is the first time you detect a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is the first time you detect a weariness in the lieutenant's voice. It is obvious he would have preferred for the body to no longer be in the tree.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Completely? Does that mean you too..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Completely? Does that mean you took the body down from the tree?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim case intro HUB]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure. Though I would also suggest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure. Though I would also suggest that you locate your blazer with your official insignia." He points to the white rectangle on his sleeve.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Losing your identification card is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Losing your identification card is a *serious* matter. My vehicle has a shortwave -- you can use it to report your badge missing. I advise you to try to locate it as quickly as possible. But getting the body down should still take precedence."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh..." There's a moment's pause, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh..." There's a moment's pause, then he continues, obviously relieved: "If you didn't have your badge then that would be very *bad*. You would need to report it on my shortwave. But since you *do* have it, we can go straight to the task at hand."
fields.Alternate1: "Oh..." There's a moment's pause. It lasts longer than it may ordinarily, given the circumstances. "If you didn't have your badge then that would be very *bad*. You would need to report it on my shortwave. But since you *do* have it, we can go straight to the task at hand."

fields.Title: You: ""No, I haven't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I haven't."

fields.Title: You: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: Jump to: [interviewhubbing]
You: ""It was not on me when I woke up.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was not on me when I woke up."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Losing your identification card is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Losing your identification card is a *serious* matter. My vehicle has a shortwave -- you can use it to report your badge missing. I would advise you to locate it as quickly as possible. But getting the body down should still take precedence."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I would ask you to step into the h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would ask you to step into the headlights of my motor carriage, but, again, it's none of my concern. I just need you to do your job."

fields.Title: You: ""It is not yet time.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is not yet time."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But for now I am going to set thos..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But for now I am going to set those possibilities aside. I'm not from the Inspectorate General."

fields.Title: You: ""You mean that guy?" (Nod toward th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean that guy?" (Nod toward the man behind the counter.) "I *totally* talked to him."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "This man is doing you a professiona..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This man is doing you a professional courtesy. He knows you haven't talked to the proprietor about whatever it was you were supposed to talk to him about.

fields.Title: You: ""What if I told you I'm not really..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What if I told you I'm not really a police officer?"

fields.Title: You: ""How can you be so sure I'm from th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How can you be so sure I'm from the police?"
fields.Alternate1: "How come you're so sure I'm from the police?"

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "On the sleeve of his bomber jacket..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On the sleeve of his bomber jacket -- as well as on its back -- are enigmatic white rectangles.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But first we have to take it down,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But first we have to take it down," he concludes.

fields.Title: You: ""Oh.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh."

fields.Title: Logic: "If you're about to embark on an inv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you're about to embark on an investigation, shouldn't you have a badge?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you don't mind, we should talk..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you don't mind, we should talk to him again. Ask him for a run-down of the area -- now that I'm here as well. I understand the scene is out back, right?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Inspectorate General means internal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspectorate General means internal affairs. What he's saying is he's not from the *rat squad* and isn't supposed to suspect such things.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean you don't have a badge?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean you don't have a badge?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim case intro HUB]
Esprit de Corps: "He is your half-brother."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is your half-brother.

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")
Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")
!(Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie"))
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Talk to the manager. Then we go ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Talk to the manager. Then we go out back and take the body down."

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.lena_intro_greeting_kim_first"]
Variable["whirling.lena_intro_greeting_kim_first"]
!(Variable["whirling.lena_intro_greeting_kim_first"])
Inland Empire: "This is your chance to come up with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is your chance to come up with a really good name for yourself. Get *creative* -- conceptualize!

fields.Title: You: ""Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Precinct 41 said they were sending..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Precinct 41 said they were sending their most seasoned detective. And you certainly look... seasoned."
